titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to prohibit Federal Reserve banks from purchasing certain obligations of foreign governments.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic Monetary Policy.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal Reserve Act to prohibit Federal Reserve banks from purchasing obligations of foreign governments unless such obligations are denominated in the currency of the foreign country involved.
